unnormalised: I remember watching "Dear Zindagi" and thinking, "Wow, therapy through Alia Bhatt!" Then I downloaded a mental health app. It helped me track my mood swings around Diwali, especially with family pressure about getting married, you know? My friend Priya at AIIMS Delhi recommended one; it's been much better than just venting to aunty Shanti.
